title: Truth time: I've been playing mobas  for 5 or so years
body:
and i'm still fucking awful at last hitting.


In any lane that isn't just afk free farm style, i average like 100-125 cs by 20 mins.

Try as i might, i either get too focused on poking,  poked out of lane too hard, or flat out fuck up my last hit and leave a creep with 1hp  so it falls to a caster bead
